class.name: GrooveJoint2D
class.description: Groove constraint for 2D physics. This is useful for making a body "slide" through a segment placed in another.

members.member: The body B's initial anchor position defined by the joint's origin and a local offset [member initial_offset] along the joint's Y axis (along the groove).
The groove's length. The groove is from the joint's origin towards [member length] along the joint's local Y axis.
